loginPage.passwordMinLengthErrorMessage: Password must be at least 8 digits long
loginPage.passwordSpecialCharacterErrorMessage: Passwords must have at least one special character

registerPage.iAgreeToTermCondition: I Agree to Term and Condition
registerPage.validPhoneNumberErrorMessage: Please enter a valid phone number

landingPage.paragraph1: This Flutter template project is built upon the principles of Clean Architecture and Modular Architecture. It provides a solid, scalable foundation designed to help you kickstart Flutter applications that are well-structured, easy to maintain, and ready for growth.
landingPage.paragraph2: This project is ideal for developers who want to jump-start their Flutter apps with a scalable and clean architecture. It’s easy to extend, maintain, and adapt to production-ready applications. Enjoy building! 🚀
landingPage.structureLine1:
- _core: Core functions, libraries, and configurations
- _shared: Shared pages, widgets, and utilities
- modules: Feature-based structure
  • auth:
    ├── data (Data layer)
    ├── domain (Domain layer)
    └── features (UI layer)
  • user: Placeholder for user features
  • todo: Reserved for future development
landingPage.structureDetails:
- _core: Core functions, libraries, and configurations
- _shared: Shared pages, widgets, and utilities
- modules: Feature-based structure
  • auth:
    ├── data (Data layer)
    ├── domain (Domain layer)
    └── features (UI layer)
  • user: Placeholder for user features
  • todo: Reserved for future development
landingPage.gettingStartedDetails:
1. Clone the repo from GitHub
2. Run `flutter pub get`
3. Launch using `flutter run`
4. Start building your features!
landingPage.techStackDetails:
🧭 GoRouter for modern routing
📦 BLoC for state management
📁 Hive for local caching and storage
🌐 Dio for networking
🧩 GetIt for dependency injection
landingPage.featuresDetails:
✅ Sign In and Sign Up Flows
✅ Home, Profile, and Settings Pages
✅ Dark and Light Theme Support
✅ Localization: English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic
✅ Responsive Design for Web and Mobile
landingPage.paragraph3:
We welcome contributions of all kinds!
Fork the repo, make changes, and submit a pull request.
